annotations: Completely separate Income Assistance from ServiceBC and provide 2 local Chetwynd workers.

" the service is very good. I first emailed and the office called me back 50 minutes which I missed . Then I called back and left a message, then the office called me again and I got the search result . I like their service. Staff are very nice . "
can be request the search through intennet

Be very clear that BCeid is different than when they say BCID. I thought they were the same and when I returned to the 2nd clerk to ask a question she was very curt with me and acted as though I was a dummy for not realizing there was more than one type of ID. Sorry for bothering her. That is why she has a job to provide information to those of us that don't know and are asking questions. Might seem like a stupid question but to me it was valid. If I knew the answer and the information I wouldn't have taken her time and bothered her.
" nothing, the service provided was exceptional "
include computer and printer for bank services

CSR is always very polite and helpful. She goes above and beyond

We needed personal help - looked on line and found address of BC Service Centre for Blanshard @ 940 suite 200. This is provided on email form REG 707/web. Revised 2014/01/08. The actual location is 771 Vernon. You need to update and make current your information about location on the website.
